description: Progress status of resource supported by ECL/Astro Repo JSON Schema 2.0

data.name: incomplete
data.description: Started and saved by user, not yet submitted for review.

data.name: submitted
data.description: Submitted by user for review, not yet published.

data.name: published
data.description: Approved by ECL staff, DOI assigned (unless user opted out), metadata viewable on the ECL interface. If after Release Date, file(s) available for download.

data.name: rejected
data.description: Submitted by user but rejected by ECL (e.g., inappropriate content).

data.name: archived
data.description: A previously public submission that has since been archived and is no longer available for metadata view or file download.

data.name: external resource
data.description: Not to be displayed in ECL interface e.g., outside agreement with CSDMS.
